entry.title: If love's a battlefield, I'll throw you a grenade
entry.summary:
Author: JustFlyingBi

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 5,374Chapters: 3/?Kudos: 65

Summary: Dick's a stripper that goes by Nightwing. Jason's a guy who not so secretly wants to save him from the life. Spoiler alert, it doesn't end in flames. It ends in Disney pick up lines. "Oh, I believe it. One look at you and I knew you couldn't be a saint if you tried." Nightwing whispered directly into his ear as Jason reluctantly let out a groan, feeling like this had already gone too far and yet simultaneously hadn't gone far enough. "But it's the trying that makes it so, so fun." Jason rolled his hips in time to match Nightwing's shallow thrusts and he smirked as the stripper gasped and then glared at Jason. "Play by the rules, love or I'll make you regret the game." Nightwing spoke quickly as his body tensed for a moment and then began to move in tune to the next song.

entry.title: What It Sounds Like
entry.summary:
Author: UltraCaffeinatedIvy

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 18,506Chapters: 6/?Kudos: 69

Summary: Things are mostly looking up for Jason Todd. He’s finally earned a scholarship to Gotham Academy and has a place that actually feels like home. He knows it's not some kind of cosmic reward for getting through a rough past, living through Catherine's addictions, his dad up and disappearing, or any of the other shit he's had to put up with. You get dealt your hand in life, for better or —more likley— worse, and try to make the best of it. Then Dick Grayson steps in. Or Where Pamela Isley adopts Jason Todd. Enrolls him in Gotham Academy and Jason struggles being a normal teenager, having friends and, of course, falls in love with Dick Grayson in the process. A coming of age story.

entry.title: the miraculous torture of jason todd
entry.summary:
Author: nux_myristica

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 25,669Chapters: 7/9Kudos: 291

Summary: It's not the job that goes wrong, oh no. It's the few moments after, as Jason speeds down Gotham streets on his motorcycle. It has nothing to do with Dick's absolutely bizarre bet with Steph about whether or not he can twerk while driving his bike. Clearly, Dick has no part in why Jason breaks his leg whatsoever. Jason did NOT see that and did NOT drive straight into a metal railing on the road because he was so damn distracted, no sir!Lies, lies, all lies.But Jason won't say any of this to Dick. Can't say no to Dick, either. Which is why Jason ends up at Dick's apartment instead of the manor to heal, living and breathing a perpetual nightmare-turned-wet-dream.

entry.title: Glass Rain
entry.summary:
Author: soaring_bubblegum

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 188,942Chapters: 40/53Kudos: 1,446

Summary: Jason Todd wakes up in the wrong Gotham. Here, he stayed dead. Here, his death broke his family so completely they became the monsters they once fought. Dick Grayson haunts the skyline with wings and talons, Barbara Gordon moves like a spider made of shadow, and something that might have once been Batman rules from a corrupted cave. The city is quarantined, the air tastes of ozone and old blood, and Jason should be running. Instead, he finds himself drawn to the creature that was once his brother—the one stalking him through twisted streets with eyes that still burn with something almost human. Some hunts, it turns out, go both ways.

entry.title: Dick bites. It's a problem.
entry.summary:
Author: VanyKruemelPendragon

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 61,527Chapters: 17/28Kudos: 319

Summary: Thanks to batsandbirdbrains (Tumblr) it's now my headcanon that Dick bit as Robin.This is a COLLECTION of oneshots, somewhat related around one thing: Dick bites.Mostly Mature for the biting and violence, though the last chapter is PWP (DickJay). “You bite strange men, you get the rinse,” Batman said. “That’s the rule.” Robin tried to twist away, but Batman levered Robin up onto his feet with one hand, the other aiming the peroxide at Robin’s mouth. Robin clamped his lips tight. Batman’s patience snapped. “Open,” he growled. “Now.”“Mh-mh!” Robin kicked, but Batman hoisted him higher, one hand under Robin’s armpit, the other holding his head in place.“You don’t want hepatitis.” Batman said, voice ticking up a notch.Robin stopped struggling, eyes wide. Batman saw the pause, and loosened his grip - only to make Robin wind out of his grip and start running. The man with the bitten arm moaned.“What the fuck is wrong with you?” he managed, voice thick with pain and shock.Robin deadlooped over him, baring his teeth in a wicked, blood-stained grin.“Don’t grab the Robin,” he said. “That’s the first lesson.” Fully written fic, upload every Wednesday and Sunday!

entry.title: My little Robin
entry.summary:
Author: VanyKruemelPendragon

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 155,169Chapters: 37/56Kudos: 257

Summary: After Robin got kidnapped, ages ago, for the ploy of a love sick Talia, for proposing to Bruce in their twisted way, she'd come to Dick, desperate, alone, pretending to be broken.Dick, just fired as Robin, with a replacement lined up, doesn't believe one word she says, until she starts being honest. Until he sees a way to handle his hurt feelings.Three years later, she's back. Not broken, not quite as desperate, and yet honest, again. Honest how she's afraid of her position as heir to the League, with an actual male heir around. Honest about her wish to get rid of said heir.Dick has no choice, not really. He has to take Damian in. It's his son, after all. Fic is fully written and will be uploaded chapter by chapter. Upload every Wednesday and Sunday. Which means this will be done... December 31st, if I do daily uploads in the Christmas weeks. It'll allow you to read the last chapter, which is set shortly after midnight, on New Year's Day, after midnight ;)

Caught between the past he cannot undo and the future he wants to protect.He must navigate fragile trust, lingering guilt, shame, and the impossible question of whether he even deserves a chance to be a father.A chance to know the little girl who carries pieces of both him and Jason.
